author: Staff Reporter
text:
DEO and Collector S. Sundaravadivelu inaugurating the campaign in Puducherry on Monday.— Photo: Special Arrangement

District Election Officer and Collector S. Sundaravadivelu on Monday inaugurated a signature campaign on the premises of Acharya Arts and Science College to motivate youth and first-time voters. The students were also provided with pamphlets highlighting the need for voter awareness.

The Elections Department is focussing on low-polled areas in the previous elections and stepping up the Systematic Voters’ Education and Electoral Participation (SVEEP) activity to substantially increase the poll percentage.

The department is working towards achieving 100 per cent polling in all Assembly constituencies in Puducherry, he said.

Mr. Sundaravadivelu also urged the students to create awareness among their families, friends and neighbours on the need to exercise the democratic right, a press release said.
title: Signature campaign to motivate young voters
